title: High Availability Requirement
description: Ensure that the system is highly available and can tolerate failures without significant downtime.

description.const: The system must be designed to be highly available with failover mechanisms in place.

scope-text.const: Applicable to all trading systems with critical uptime requirements.

availability-target.description: The target availability percentage the system must meet.

failover-time.description: Maximum time allowed for a failover to occur.

responsible-team.description: The team responsible for maintaining the system's high availability.

evidence-type.description: Type of evidence required to demonstrate compliance.
evidence-type.default: System uptime reports, failover test results.
